meta.title: Bouncy Feet - Dancing is for everybody.

home.title: Bouncy Feet!
home.description0: Welcome to the dance app Bouncy Feet.
home.description1: I want to motivate everyone to try out shuffle dancing and practice as often as possible. The app makes it easy to discover new moves and get started with it. Maybe you also like leveling up your practicing score and competing on the global leaderboard.
home.description2: However, I am still experimenting. Expect things to change frequently. Consider this an Alpha version of Bouncy Feet. If you run into issues with the app, please open an issue on GitHub.
home.description3: Try the App now to get started Shuffling or improve your skill.
home.go-to-github: Report issues or contribute to the development.

lesson.title: Lesson
lesson.exercise-beat-description: You can either dance along a simple beat or play your own music outside Bouncy Feet and match the beat.
lesson.exercise-start-description: Place your phone on the floor and stand where the camera can see you. Your entire body from head to toes must be visible.

record.title: Dance
record.description: Bring your own music and then record yourself while dancing.
record.description1: The video is evaluated locally on your device. It never leaves your device.
record.learn-hint: The app will show you how to position your body. If you get it right, the next pose will appear.
record.train-hint: Train the selected step while the app checks and counts. We recommend listening to your own music while doing so.
record.general-hint: Get ready! Find a spot with enough space to dance and then place the phone such that you can see the screen and the camera can see you.
record.no-upload-hint: Hint: The recording is evaluated on your device and never uploaded or shared with the developers.
record.bpm-tap-button: Tap along with your music to match the beat
record.estimate-bpm-hint: You have to tap the button to detect the beat before starting the exercise.
record.metronome-subtitle: No music? Play a simple beat:
record.no-video-for-review: Nothing recorded, nothing to review. Make sure to enable the camera and the sound and follow the instructions. The recording will not start until the camera can detect your full body.

settings.title: Settings
settings.double-speed: Also dance to the offbeat (double speed)

info.learn: Learn each position of the step without music.
info.train: Practice the step with music and track your progress.

consent.title: Enter leaderboard
consent.text0: To be shown on the leaderboard, we need to submit your personal dance statistics to the server. Videos are never uploaded.
consent.question: Do you want to send your statistics and have an entry on the public leaderboard?

settings.title: Settings
settings.consent-title: Show my progress in public leaderboard

step.wip-tracking: Video tracking this step is still under development.
